summary: Brandon Bruce Lee  was an American actor of Han Chinese, German, English and Swedish descent.
full_text:
Brandon Bruce Lee  was an American actor and martial artist. He was the son of martial arts film actor Bruce Lee and teacher Linda Lee Cadwell, the grandson of Cantonese opera singer Lee Hoi-chuen, and brother of Shannon Lee.
Starting his career with a supporting role in the 1986 television film Kung Fu: The Movie, Lee starred in several low-budget action films during the late 1980s and early 1990s. He died in a firearms accident while filming his fifth film, the supernatural action film The Crow, in 1993. The film was released posthumously in 1994 with the help of a stunt double and special effects.
title: Brandon Lee
